page.title: 15THE LIFE OF AN 8 YEAR OLD
page.content: At 10 o'clock we have play everyone goes outside. The boys play football and girls play games like bulldog scarecrow,tig, chain tig, things like that. Sometimes some girls join in with the boys and sometimes some boys join in with the girls. When play is over you get on with what you were doing before play. At lunch some people go home and some people stay. Sally and I go home. Mummy and Daddy can't give us lunch because they are at work so Grandma gives us lunch. Lunch starts at 12 o'clock and finishes at 1 o'clock. If you go home when you come to school you play till the bell rings. In the afternoon we usually do craftwork till 2 o'clock because then we have play. After play we come in and finish our craftwork.
